unit1.title: Unit 1: 기본 동사 및 관련 어휘

words.example: They abandoned the car and ran away.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðeɪ əˈbændənd ðə kɑːr ænd ræn əˈweɪ/
words.translation: 그들은 차를 버리고 달아났다.

words.example: The abandonment of the project disappointed the team.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði əˈbændənmənt əv ðə ˈprɑːdʒekt ˌdɪsəˈpɔɪntɪd ðə tiːm/
words.translation: 그 프로젝트의 포기는 팀을 실망시켰다.

words.example: He is in favor of abolishing the death penalty.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi ɪz ɪn ˈfeɪvər əv əˈbɑːlɪʃɪŋ ðə dɛθ ˈpɛnəlti/
words.translation: 그는 사형제를 폐지하는 것에 찬성한다.

words.example: The abolition of slavery was a historic achievement.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði ˌæbəˈlɪʃn əv ˈsleɪvəri wəz ə hɪˈstɔːrɪk əˈtʃiːvmənt/
words.translation: 노예제 폐지는 역사적 업적이었다.

words.example: He hopes to work abroad next year.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi hoʊps tu wɜːrk əˈbrɔːd nɛkst jɪr/
words.translation: 그는 내년에 해외에서 근무하길 희망한다.

words.example: The land dropped off abruptly.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə lænd drɑpt ɔːf əˈbrʌptli/
words.translation: 땅이 갑자기 푹 꺼졌다.

words.example: His abrupt departure surprised everyone.
words.example_pronunciation: /hɪz əˈbrʌpt dɪˈpɑːrtʃər sərˈpraɪzd ˈɛvriwʌn/
words.translation: 그의 갑작스러운 출발은 모두를 놀라게 했다.

words.example: Mark will be in charge in my absence.
words.example_pronunciation: /mɑːrk wɪl bi ɪn tʃɑːrdʒ ɪn maɪ ˈæbsəns/
words.translation: 내가 없는 동안 Mark가 책임을 맡을 것이다.

words.example: She was absent from school due to illness.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi wəz ˈæbsənt frəm skuːl duː tu ˈɪlnəs/
words.translation: 그녀는 병 때문에 학교에 결석했다.

words.example: He has absolutely no experience in this field.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi hæz ˈæbsəluːtli noʊ ɪkˈspɪriəns ɪn ðɪs fiːld/
words.translation: 그는 이 분야에 전혀 경험이 없다.

words.example: The king had absolute power over the land.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə kɪŋ hæd ˈæbsəluːt ˈpaʊər ˈoʊvər ðə lænd/
words.translation: 왕은 그 땅에 절대적인 권력을 가지고 있었다.

words.example: Plant roots absorb moisture.
words.example_pronunciation: /plænt ruːts əbˈzɔːrb ˈmɔɪstʃər/
words.translation: 식물의 뿌리는 수분을 흡수한다.

words.example: The absorption of nutrients is essential for growth.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði əbˈsɔːrpʃn əv ˈnuːtriənts ɪz ɪˈsɛnʃl fɔːr groʊθ/
words.translation: 영양소의 흡수는 성장에 필수적이다.

words.example: Human beings are capable of abstract thought.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈhjuːmən ˈbiːɪŋz ɑːr ˈkeɪpəbl əv ˈæbstrækt θɔːt/
words.translation: 인간은 추상적 사고를 할 수 있다.

words.example: Her painting is an abstraction of nature.
words.example_pronunciation: /hər ˈpeɪntɪŋ ɪz ən æbˈstrækʃn əv ˈneɪtʃər/
words.translation: 그녀의 그림은 자연의 추상적 표현이다.

words.example: Rainfall is abundant in the region.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈreɪnfɔːl ɪz əˈbʌndənt ɪn ðə ˈriːdʒən/
words.translation: 그 지역은 강수층이 풍부하다.

words.example: The region enjoys an abundance of natural resources.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə ˈriːdʒən ɪnˈdʒɔɪz ən əˈbʌndəns əv ˈnætʃərəl ˈriːsɔːrsɪz/
words.translation: 그 지역은 천연자원의 풍부함을 누리고 있다.

words.example: The boy was a victim of abuse.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə bɔɪ wəz ə ˈvɪktɪm əv əˈbjuːs/
words.translation: 그 소년은 학대의 피해자였다.

words.example: He abused his authority to gain personal benefits.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi əˈbjuːzd hɪz əˈθɔːrəti tu ɡeɪn ˈpɜːrsənl ˈbɛnəfɪts/
words.translation: 그는 개인적 이익을 위해 권한을 남용했다.

words.example: The car accelerated to a speed of 80 miles per hour.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə kɑːr əkˈseləreɪtɪd tu ə spiːd əv ˈeɪti maɪlz pər ˈaʊər/
words.translation: 그 차는 시속 80마일까지 속도를 높였다。

words.example: The acceleration of the economy boosted job creation.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði əkˌseləˈreɪʃn əv ði ɪˈkɒnəmi ˈbuːstɪd dʒɑːb kriˈeɪʃn/
words.translation: 경제의 가속은 일자리 창출을 촉진했다。

words.example: They offered me a job and I accepted it.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðeɪ ˈɔːfərd mi ə dʒɑːb ænd aɪ əkˈseptɪd ɪt/
words.translation: 그들은 내게 일자리를 제공했고, 나는 그것을 수용했다。

words.example: Her acceptance of the proposal was a relief.
words.example_pronunciation: /hər əkˈseptəns əv ðə prəˈpoʊzl wəz ə rɪˈliːf/
words.translation: 그녀의 제안 수용은 안도감을 주었다。

words.example: We have Internet access at the library.
words.example_pronunciation: /wi hæv ˈɪntərnɛt ˈækses æt ðə ˈlaɪbrəri/
words.translation: 우리는 도서관에서 인터넷에 접속할 수 있다.

words.example: You need a password to access the system.
words.example_pronunciation: /ju niːd ə ˈpæswɜːrd tu ˈækses ðə ˈsɪstəm/
words.translation: 시스템에 접근하려면 비밀번호가 필요하다。

words.example: They believe that the fire was started accidentally.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðeɪ bɪˈliːv ðæt ðə ˈfaɪər wəz ˈstɑːrtɪd ˌæksɪˈdɛntəli/
words.translation: 그 화재는 우발적으로 시작된 것으로 믿고 있다.

words.example: The discovery was purely accidental.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə dɪˈskʌvəri wəz ˈpjʊərli ˌæksɪˈdɛntl/
words.translation: 그 발견은 순전히 우연한 것이었다。

words.example: The hotel can only accommodate about 100 people.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə hoʊˈtɛl kæn ˈoʊnli əˈkɒmədeɪt əˈbaʊt wʌn ˈhʌndrəd ˈpiːpl/
words.translation: 그 호텔은 겨우 100명 정도만 수용할 수 있다。

words.example: The accommodation at the resort was luxurious.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði əˌkɒməˈdeɪʃn æt ðə rɪˈzɔːrt wəz lʌɡˈʒʊəriəs/
words.translation: 리조트의 숙소는 호화로웠다。

words.example: I want you to accompany her.
words.example_pronunciation: /aɪ wɒnt ju tu əˈkʌmpəni hər/
words.translation: 난 네가 그녀와 함께 가길 바란다。

words.example: The piano provided accompaniment for the singer.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə piˈænoʊ prəˈvaɪdɪd əˈkʌmpənimənt fɔːr ðə ˈsɪŋər/
words.translation: 피아노는 가수의 반주를 제공했다。

words.example: We have accomplished much in a short period of time.
words.example_pronunciation: /wi hæv əˈkɒmplɪʃt mʌtʃ ɪn ə ʃɔːrt ˈpɪəriəd əv taɪm/
words.translation: 우리는 짧은 시간에 많은 것을 이루었다。

words.example: Finishing the marathon was a great accomplishment.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈfɪnɪʃɪŋ ðə ˈmærəθɒn wəz ə ɡreɪt əˈkɒmplɪʃmənt/
words.translation: 마라톤 완주는 큰 업적이었다。

words.example: According to the law, we had to pay a small fine.
words.example_pronunciation: /əˈkɔːrdɪŋ tu ðə lɔː, wi hæd tu peɪ ə smɔːl faɪn/
words.translation: 법에 따라 우리는 벌금을 내야 했다。

words.example: No complaint was made. Accordingly, they took no action.
words.example_pronunciation: /noʊ kəmˈpleɪnt wəz meɪd. əˈkɔːrdɪŋli, ðeɪ tʊk noʊ ˈækʃn/
words.translation: 불평이 없었기에, 그들은 아무 조치도 취하지 않았다。

words.example: African-Americans account for about 13% of the US population.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈæfrɪkən əˈmɛrɪkənz əˈkaʊnt fɔːr əˈbaʊt θɜːˈtiːn pərˈsɛnt əv ðə juː ˈes ˌpɒpjʊˈleɪʃn/
words.translation: 흑인은 미국 인구의 약 13%를 차지한다。

words.example: He gave a brief account of what had happened.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi ɡeɪv ə briːf əˈkaʊnt əv wɒt hæd ˈhæpənd/
words.translation: 그는 무슨 일이 있었는지 간단히 설명했다。

words.example: His experience is accounted valuable by the team.
words.example_pronunciation: /hɪz ɪkˈspɪəriəns ɪz əˈkaʊntɪd ˈvæljʊəbl baɪ ðə tiːm/
words.translation: 그의 경험은 팀에서 가치 있게 간주된다。

words.example: Managers must be accountable for their decisions.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈmænɪdʒərz mʌst bi əˈkaʊntəbl fɔːr ðeər dɪˈsɪʒnz/
words.translation: 관리자들은 그들의 결정에 책임을 져야 한다。

words.example: Accountability is crucial in leadership roles.
words.example_pronunciation: /əˌkaʊntəˈbɪləti ɪz ˈkruːʃl ɪn ˈliːdərʃɪp roʊlz/
words.translation: 책임은 리더십 역할에서 매우 중요하다。

words.example: He began his career as an accountant for his father's company.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi bɪˈɡæn hɪz kəˈrɪər æz ən əˈkaʊntənt fɔːr hɪz ˈfɑːðərz ˈkʌmpəni/
words.translation: 그는 자신의 아버지 회사의 회계사로 직장 일을 시작했다.

words.example: His novel is historically accurate.
words.example_pronunciation: /hɪz ˈnɒvl ɪz hɪˈstɒrɪkli ˈækjərət/
words.translation: 그의 소설은 역사적인 면에서 정확하다。

words.example: The accuracy of the data is critical for the experiment.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði ˈækjərəsi əv ðə ˈdeɪtə ɪz ˈkrɪtɪkl fɔːr ði ɪkˈspɛrɪmənt/
words.translation: 데이터의 정확성은 실험에 매우 중요하다。

words.example: No one could accuse him of being a coward.
words.example_pronunciation: /noʊ wʌn kʊd əˈkjuːz hɪm əv ˈbiːɪŋ ə ˈkaʊərd/
words.translation: 아무도 그를 겁쟁이라고 비난할 수 없었다。

words.example: The accusation of theft damaged her reputation.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði ˌækjuˈzeɪʃn əv θɛft ˈdæmɪdʒd hər ˌrɛpjʊˈteɪʃn/
words.translation: 도둑질에 대한 비난은 그녀의 평판을 손상시켰다。

words.example: She is accustomed to living on the farm.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi ɪz əˈkʌstəmd tu ˈlɪvɪŋ ɒn ðə fɑːrm/
words.translation: 그녀는 농장에서 생활하는 데 익숙해져 있다。

words.example: He tried to accustom himself to the new schedule.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi traɪd tu əˈkʌstəm hɪmˈsɛlf tu ðə njuː ˈʃɛdjuːl/
words.translation: 그는 새 일정에 익숙해지려고 노력했다。

words.example: He felt an ache in his leg gradually.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi fɛlt ən eɪk ɪn hɪz lɛɡ ˈɡrædʒuəli/
words.translation: 그는 서서히 그의 다리에 아픔을 느꼈다。

words.example: My head aches after a long day at work.
words.example_pronunciation: /maɪ hɛd eɪks ˈæftər ə lɒŋ deɪ æt wɜːrk/
words.translation: 긴 하루 일과 후에 머리가 아프다。

words.example: He eventually achieved his goal of becoming an actor.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi ɪˈvɛntʃuəli əˈtʃiːvd hɪz ɡoʊl əv bɪˈkʌmɪŋ ən ˈæktər/
words.translation: 그는 결국 영화배우가 되려는 자신의 꿈을 성취했다。

words.example: Winning the award was a significant achievement.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈwɪnɪŋ ði əˈwɔːrd wəz ə sɪɡˈnɪfɪkənt əˈtʃiːvmənt/
words.translation: 그 상을 받은 것은 중요한 업적이었다。

words.example: He never acknowledges his mistakes.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi ˈnɛvər əkˈnɒlɪdʒɪz hɪz mɪˈsteɪks/
words.translation: 그는 결코 자신의 실수를 인정하지 않는다。

words.example: Her acknowledgment of the error earned respect.
words.example_pronunciation: /hər əkˈnɒlɪdʒmənt əv ði ˈɛər ˈɜːrnd rɪˈspɛkt/
words.translation: 그녀의 실수 인정은 존경을 받았다。

words.example: Acid rain causes widespread damage to the environment.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈæsɪd reɪn ˈkɔːzɪz ˈwaɪdsprɛd ˈdæmɪdʒ tu ði ɪnˈvaɪrənmənt/
words.translation: 산성비는 환경에 광범위한 피해를 준다。

words.example: She ran into an old acquaintance at the grocery store.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi ræn ˈɪntu ən oʊld əˈkweɪntəns æt ðə ˈɡroʊsəri stɔːr/
words.translation: 그녀는 식료품점에서 오래 전에 알고 지내던 사람을 우연히 만났다。

words.example: Let me acquaint you with the new rules.
words.example_pronunciation: /lɛt mi əˈkweɪnt ju wɪð ðə njuː ruːlz/
words.translation: 새로운 규칙을 알려주겠습니다.

words.example: He has acquired a reputation as a hard worker.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi hæz əˈkwaɪərd ə ˌrɛpjʊˈteɪʃn æz ə hɑːrd ˈwɜːrkər/
words.translation: 그는 열심히 일하는 사람이라는 평판을 얻었다。

words.example: The acquisition of new skills improved her career.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði ˌækwɪˈzɪʃn əv njuː skɪlz ɪmˈpruːvd hər kəˈrɪər/
words.translation: 새로운 기술의 습득은 그녀의 경력을 향상시켰다。

words.example: There is an acute shortage of housing facilities.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðeər ɪz ən əˈkjuːt ˈʃɔːrtɪdʒ əv ˈhaʊzɪŋ fəˈsɪlətiz/
words.translation: 주거시설이 심각하게 부족하다。

words.example: She was acutely aware of the danger.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi wəz əˈkjuːtli əˈweər əv ðə ˈdeɪndʒər/
words.translation: 그녀는 위험을 극심하게 인지하고 있었다。

words.example: He has adapted to college life quite easily.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi hæz əˈdæptɪd tu ˈkɒlɪdʒ laɪf kwaɪt ˈiːzəli/
words.translation: 그는 대학 생활에 상당히 쉽게 적응해왔다。

words.example: The film is an adaptation of a famous novel.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə fɪlm ɪz ən ˌædæpˈteɪʃn əv ə ˈfeɪməs ˈnɒvl/
words.translation: 그 영화는 유명한 소설을 개작한 것이다。

words.example: She had trouble adjusting to living in the country.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi hæd ˈtrʌbl əˈdʒʌstɪŋ tu ˈlɪvɪŋ ɪn ðə ˈkʌntri/
words.translation: 그녀는 시골에 사는 데 적응하는 데 어려움을 겪었다。

words.example: Moving to a new city requires a period of adjustment.
words.example_pronunciation: /ˈmuːvɪŋ tu ə njuː ˈsɪti rɪˈkwaɪərz ə ˈpɪəriəd əv əˈdʒʌstmənt/
words.translation: 새 도시로 이사하는 것은 적응 기간을 필요로 한다。

words.example: The administration of the university is located downtown.
words.example_pronunciation: /ði ədˌmɪnɪˈstreɪʃn əv ðə ˌjuːnɪˈvɜːrsəti ɪz loʊˈkeɪtɪd ˈdaʊntaʊn/
words.translation: 그 대학의 행정부는 도심에 위치해 있다。

words.example: The nurse will administer the medicine.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə nɜːrs wɪl ədˈmɪnɪstər ðə ˈmɛdsɪn/
words.translation: 간호사가 약을 투여할 것이다。

words.example: I really admire your courage.
words.example_pronunciation: /aɪ ˈrɪəli ədˈmaɪər jɔːr ˈkɜːrɪdʒ/
words.translation: 나는 당신의 용기를 정말 존경합니다。

words.example: She looked at him with admiration.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi lʊkt æt hɪm wɪð ˌædməˈreɪʃn/
words.translation: 그녀는 그를 존경하며 바라보았다。

words.example: She admitted that she had made a mistake.
words.example_pronunciation: /ʃi ədˈmɪtɪd ðæt ʃi hæd meɪd ə mɪˈsteɪk/
words.translation: 그녀는 자신이 실수를 했다고 인정했다。

words.example: His admission of guilt was a relief to everyone.
words.example_pronunciation: /hɪz ədˈmɪʃn əv ɡɪlt wəz ə rɪˈliːf tu ˈɛvriwʌn/
words.translation: 그의 유죄 인정은 모두에게 안도감이었다。

words.example: They decided to adopt a child.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðeɪ dɪˈsaɪdɪd tu əˈdɒpt ə tʃaɪld/
words.translation: 그들은 아이를 입양하기로 결정했다。

words.example: The adoption of new technology improved efficiency.

words.translation: 그는 경멸하는 목소리로 말했다.

words.example: He poured the contents of the package onto the floor.

words.example: He held a contest to see who could write the best essay.

words.translation: 그녀는 피아노 대회의 최연소 참가자이다.

words.translation: 그들은 그 호텔을 아파트 건물로 개조했다.

words.example: The police are on the lookout for an escaped convict.

words.example: The two workers cooperated to fix the broken pipe.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə tuː ˈwɜːrkərz koʊˈɒpəˌreɪtɪd tu fɪks ðə ˈbroʊkən paɪp/

words.example: The book is about coping with stress.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə bʊk ɪz əˈbaʊt ˈkoʊpɪŋ wɪð strɛs/

words.example: She is always copy her older sister.

words.translation: 그의 가족은 여전히 그의 곡에 대한 저작권을 보유하고 있다.

words.translation: 자금 부족이 문제의 핵심이다.

words.example: He works for a large American corporation.

words.translation: 그는 미국 대기업에서 근무한다.

words.example: The article does not correspond to what the politician actually said.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə ˈɑːrtɪkl dʌz nɑːt ˌkɒrɪˈspɒnd tu wʌt ðə ˌpɒləˈtɪʃən ˈæktʃuəli sɛd/

words.example: He lives in a cottage by the lake.

words.example: He offered to sleep on the couch.
words.example_pronunciation: /hi ˈɔːfərd tu slip ɒn ðə kaʊtʃ/

words.example: The city council is considering a ban on smoking in restaurants.
words.example_pronunciation: /ðə ˈsɪti kaʊnsl ɪz kənˈsɪdərɪŋ ə bæn ɒn ˈsmoʊkɪŋ ɪn ˈrɛstəˌrɑːnts/

words.example: We took a long drive through the open countryside.

words.translation: 우리는 탁 트인 전원을 통과하며 장시간 드라이브했다.

words.example_pronunciation: /ðə ˈɪʃuː ɪz nɑːt ˈɡɛtɪŋ mʌtʃ ˈkʌvərɪdʒ ɪn ðə ˈmeɪnˌstriːm prɛs/
